Stephen Elop and Steve Ballmer both spoke Friday at a news briefing in London that was broadcast on the Internet. This partnership with Nokia will accelerate, dramatically accelerate, the development of a vibrant, strong Windows Phone ecosystem, Steve Ballmer said. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
